name: Linda Deir
what_you_do: Linda Deir is a transition coach, author, speaker, and trainer who helps individuals remember their true selves and purpose, guiding them to live fully with the assistance of their spiritual guides.
who_you_serve: Linda serves individuals seeking personal transformation, self-discovery, and spiritual guidance, primarily in a B2C context.
current_projects: 2025 Soul Gathering with your Guides – Linda Deir Transition Coach
bio: Author of the book 'Guided', dynamic speaker, and trainer with a focus on personal transformation and spiritual guidance.
business_focus: Linda Deir is a transition coach, author, speaker, and trainer who helps individuals remember their true selves and purpose, guiding them to live fully with the assistance of their spiritual guides. (life coaching)
